activities: Signode receives a variety of types of personal information from its subsidiaries, affiliates, agents, contractors, suppliers, customers and employees in the EU, EEA and Switzerland consisting of electronic and hard copy personal information and sensitive personal information embodied in (i) correspondence, (ii) documents for conducting business, (iii) human resources data collected and processed within the context of Signode’s operations.  These data are collected and transferred to the US in support of the company's employment, regulatory, marketing, sales, financial, legal and other commercial and business activities and operations.
eucountries: Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Human resources data, Off-line, On-Line, Manually processed data, Customer, supplier, and distributor data
recoursemech: EU data protection authorities & Swiss FDPIC
